name: Math-challenge
body:
# PRIVACY POLICY
Last update: 15.02.2014

The privacy of our users using Math Challenge is important to us. Here is information on what types of data we receive and collect when you use the application. We never sell your personal information to third parties.

This privacy policy may be updated from time to time. You should consult this privacy policy regularly for any changes.

## 1. Information Collection

### Analytics Information Collection Regarding Usage of Math Challenge

We use a game analytics service to collect and analyze usage information from all versions of Math Challenge. Game analytics service is provided by GameAnalytics and analytics information is collected, maintained and utilized following GameAnalytics privacy policy. GameAnalytics privacy policy is available at:

www.gameanalytics.com/privacy.html

## 2. Contact Information

If you have any questions related to our privacy policy, contact us by email aglem@live.de
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
